```{r}
### read in training and test datasets 
master_file <- read_csv(here("data", "master_data_file_dec24_with_national.csv"), 
                        locale = locale(encoding = "ISO-8859-1")) %>%
  mutate(dhsyear = 2024) %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  mutate(continent = case_when(continent == "Africa" ~ 1,
                               TRUE ~ 0)) %>% 
  dplyr::select(country, all_of(c(dhs_vars, fb_feats))) %>% 
  filter(!is.na(perc_used_internet_past12months_wght_age_15_to_49_wom)) %>% drop_na() 

master_file_full <- read_csv(here("data", "master_data_file_dec24_with_national.csv"), 
                  locale = locale(encoding = "ISO-8859-1")) %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  mutate(continent = case_when(continent == "Africa" ~ 1,
                               TRUE ~ 0)) %>% 
  filter(!(country == "Bangladesh" & dhsyear == "2014")) %>% 
  filter(!(country == "India" & dhsyear == "2014")) %>% 
  filter(!(country == "Cambodia" & dhsyear == "2014")) %>%
  filter(!(country == "Nepal" & dhsyear == "2016")) %>%
  filter(!(country == "Philippines" & dhsyear == "2017")) %>%
      mutate(pop_all_age_total = pop_all_age_female + pop_all_age_male) %>%
  filter(!is.na(fb_pntr_18p_female)) %>% 
  mutate(dhsyear = 2024)

## read in predictions
predictions_wide <- read_csv(here("out", "full_predictions.csv")) %>% 
  filter(year == 2024 & month == 11)

## ground truth data 
ground_truth <- fread(here("data", "internet_mobile_indicator_clean.csv")) 
```



```{r}
predictions_wide <- predictions_wide %>% 
  left_join(master_file_full, by = c("gid_0", "gid_1", "country"))
```


```{r}
national_estimates <- predictions_wide %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  group_by(country) %>% 
  summarize(
    # Mobile telephone ownership
    prop_men_mobile_pred = sum((predicted_perc_owns_mobile_telephone_wght_age_15_to_49_men / 100) * pop_all_age_male) / sum(pop_all_age_male),
    prop_wom_mobile_pred = sum((predicted_perc_owns_mobile_telephone_wght_age_15_to_49_wom / 100) * pop_all_age_female) / sum(pop_all_age_female),
    prop_men_mobile_obs = sum((observed_perc_owns_mobile_telephone_wght_age_15_to_49_men / 100) * pop_all_age_male) / sum(pop_all_age_male),
    prop_wom_mobile_obs = sum((observed_perc_owns_mobile_telephone_wght_age_15_to_49_wom / 100) * pop_all_age_female) / sum(pop_all_age_female),
    # Mobile telephone ownership ratio
    fm_ratio_mobile_pred = sum((predicted_perc_owns_mobile_telephone_wght_age_15_to_49_fm_ratio) * (pop_all_age_male + pop_all_age_female)) / sum(pop_all_age_male + pop_all_age_female),
    fm_ratio_mobile_obs = sum((observed_perc_owns_mobile_telephone_wght_age_15_to_49_fm_ratio) * (pop_all_age_male + pop_all_age_female)) / sum(pop_all_age_male + pop_all_age_female),
    # Internet usage
    prop_men_internet_pred = sum((predicted_perc_used_internet_past12months_wght_age_15_to_49_men / 100) * pop_all_age_male) / sum(pop_all_age_male),
    prop_wom_internet_pred = sum((predicted_perc_used_internet_past12months_wght_age_15_to_49_wom / 100) * pop_all_age_female) / sum(pop_all_age_female),
    prop_men_internet_obs = sum((observed_perc_used_internet_past12months_wght_age_15_to_49_men / 100) * pop_all_age_male) / sum(pop_all_age_male),
    prop_wom_internet_obs = sum((observed_perc_used_internet_past12months_wght_age_15_to_49_wom / 100) * pop_all_age_female) / sum(pop_all_age_female),
    # Internet usage ratio
    fm_ratio_internet_pred = sum((predicted_perc_used_internet_past12months_wght_age_15_to_49_fm_ratio) * (pop_all_age_male + pop_all_age_female)) / sum(pop_all_age_male + pop_all_age_female),
    fm_ratio_internet_obs = sum((observed_perc_used_internet_past12months_wght_age_15_to_49_fm_ratio) * (pop_all_age_male + pop_all_age_female)) / sum(pop_all_age_male + pop_all_age_female))
```

## Comparison with MICS

```{r}
## prepare df 
national_predictions_comparison_df <- final_predictions %>% 
  select(gid_0, country, ends_with("national")) %>% 
  left_join(ground_truth, by = c("gid_0" = "iso3")) %>% 
  filter(survey_type == "mics6") %>% 
  filter(survey_start > 2018) %>%
  mutate(internet_use_in_12_months_wom = internet_use_in_12_months_wom ) %>% 
  mutate(internet_use_in_12_months_men = internet_use_in_12_months_men) %>% 
  mutate(owns_mobile_phone_wom = owns_mobile_phone_wom ) %>% 
  mutate(owns_mobile_phone_men = owns_mobile_phone_men) %>% 
  distinct()

p1 <- national_predictions_comparison_df %>% 
  ggplot(aes(y = internet_women_national, x = internet_use_in_12_months_wom, label = gid_0, color = survey_start)) + 
  geom_text() +
  theme_cowplot() + 
  geom_abline(color = "grey", linetype = "dashed") + 
  ylim(0, 1) + 
  xlim(0, 1) + 
  labs(x = "Ground Truth, MICS", 
       y = "National Prediction",
       title = "Internet, Women") + 
  stat_cor(aes(label = paste0("italic(r)~`=`~", ..r..)), parse = TRUE) + 
  theme(legend.position = "none")


p2 <- national_predictions_comparison_df %>%

# Extract the legend
legend <- cowplot::get_legend(
  p6 +
  theme(
    legend.position = "bottom",
    legend.title = element_text(size = 12, hjust = 0.5),  # Center the title
    legend.text = element_text(size = 10),
    legend.key.width = unit(2, "cm"),
    legend.spacing.x = unit(1, "cm"),
    legend.box = "vertical",  # Arrange title and legend items vertically
    legend.box.just = "center",  # Center the legend box
    legend.justification = "center"  # Center the entire legend
  ) +
  guides(color = guide_colorbar(title.position = "top", title.hjust = 0.5)) +  # Move title to the top and center it
  scale_color_continuous(name = "MICS Survey Year")  # Use continuous color scale
)

# Combine plots and legend
mics_comparison <- plot_grid(p1, p2, p3, p4, p5, p6, ncol = 2, nrow = 3, labels = "AUTO")

mics_comparison_legend <- plot_grid(
  mics_comparison,
  legend,
  ncol = 1,
  rel_heights = c(1, 0.1),  # Adjust the legend height as needed
  align = "v",  # Align plots vertically
  axis = "t"    # Center alignment for the legend
)

# Display the combined plot with legend
mics_comparison_legend

ggsave(plot = mics_comparison_legend, filename = here("figures", "mics_comparison.png"), height = 12, width = 8)
```

## national statistics for abstract 


```{r}
## internet sums and proportions 
internet_sum <- predictions_wide %>% 
  summarize(total_female_internet_users = sum(predicted_perc_used_internet_past12months_wght_age_15_to_49_wom * pop_all_age_female) / 100,
            total_male_internet_users = sum(predicted_perc_used_internet_past12months_wght_age_15_to_49_men * pop_all_age_male) / 100,
            prop_women_internet = sum(predicted_perc_used_internet_past12months_wght_age_15_to_49_wom * pop_all_age_female) / 100 / sum(pop_all_age_female),
            prop_men_internet = sum(predicted_perc_used_internet_past12months_wght_age_15_to_49_men * pop_all_age_male) / 100 / sum(pop_all_age_male)) 

## mobile sums and proportions 
mobile_sum <- predictions_wide %>% 
  summarize(total_women_mobile = sum(predicted_perc_owns_mobile_telephone_wght_age_15_to_49_wom * pop_all_age_female) / 100,
            total_men_mobile = sum(predicted_perc_owns_mobile_telephone_wght_age_15_to_49_men * pop_all_age_male) / 100,
            prop_women_mobile = sum(predicted_perc_owns_mobile_telephone_wght_age_15_to_49_wom * pop_all_age_female) / 100 / sum(pop_all_age_female),
            prop_men_mobile = sum(predicted_perc_owns_mobile_telephone_wght_age_15_to_49_men * pop_all_age_male) / 100 / sum(pop_all_age_male))

## how many more female than male internet users 
glue::glue('More male than female internet users = {round(internet_sum$total_male_internet_users - internet_sum$total_female_internet_users, 0)}')

## percentage less likely to use internet
glue::glue('Women are {round((internet_sum$prop_men_internet - internet_sum$prop_women_internet) / internet_sum$prop_men_internet * 100, 2)}% less likely than men to use the internet')

## how many more female than male mobile phone owners 
glue::glue('More male than female mobile phone owners = {round(mobile_sum$total_men_mobile - mobile_sum$total_women_mobile, 0)}')

## percentage less likely to own mobile phones
glue::glue('Women are {round((mobile_sum$prop_men_mobile - mobile_sum$prop_women_mobile) / mobile_sum$prop_men_mobile * 100, 2)}% less likely than men to own mobile phones')
```
